00008 GF256::Element GF256::Multiply(Element a, Element b) const
00009 {
00010         word result = 0, t = b;
00011 
00012         for (unsigned int i=0; i<8; i++)
00013         {
00014                 result <<= 1;
00015                 if (result & 0x100)
00016                         result ^= m_modulus;
00017 
00018                 t <<= 1;
00019                 if (t & 0x100)
00020                         result ^= a;
00021         }
00022 
00023         return (GF256::Element) result;
00024 }
00025 
00026 GF256::Element GF256::MultiplicativeInverse(Element a) const
00027 {
00028         Element result = a;
00029         for (int i=1; i<7; i++)
00030                 result = Multiply(Square(result), a);
00031         return Square(result);
00032 }
